Function template inclusive

boost::histogram::axis::traits::inclusive — Returns true if axis is inclusive or false.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/histogram/axis/traits.hpp>


template<typename Axis> constexpr bool inclusive(const Axis & axis);

Description

See is_inclusive for details.

Parameters:

axis

any axis instance
